article_title: The impact of six months of war between Israel and Gaza.
sentence: Last  October,  hundreds  of  Hamas  gunmen  stormed  southern  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  others  hostage.

article_title: The impact of six months of war between Israel and Gaza.
sentence: The  grim  anniversary  comes  as  the  war  in  Gaza  continues  -  more  than  33,137  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  and  tens  of  thousands  injured  by  Israeli  strikes  since  the  start  of  the  war,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
